alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Norfolk; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 4:00PM EDT until July 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Worcester County in central Massachusetts... Northwestern Norfolk County in eastern Massachusetts... South central Middlesex County in northeastern Massachusetts... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 359 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grafton, or 7 miles south of Shrewsbury, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Framingham, Natick, Needham, Norwood, Milford, Wellesley, Walpole, Westborough, Grafton, Ashland, Northbridge, Hopkinton, Westwood, Holliston, Medway, Medfield, Weston, Sutton, Millis and Upton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
